00042 class SIM_API cArray : public cOwnedObject
00043 {
00044   public:
00048     class Iterator
00049     {
00050       private:
00051         cArray *array;
00052         int k;
00053 
00054       public:
00060         Iterator(const cArray& a, bool athead=true)  {init(a, athead);}
00061 
00065         void init(const cArray& a, bool athead=true);
00066 
00071         cObject *operator()()  {return array->get(k);}
00072 
00076         bool end() const   {return k<0 || k>=array->size();}
00077 
00086         cObject *operator++(int);
00087 
00096         cObject *operator--(int);
00097     };
00098 
00099   private:
00100     enum {FL_TKOWNERSHIP = 4};
00101     cObject **vect;   // vector of objects
00102     int capacity;     // allocated size of vect[]
00103     int delta;        // if needed, grows by delta
00104     int firstfree;    // first free position in vect[]
00105     int last;         // last used position
00106 
00107   public:
00110 
00116     cArray(const cArray& list);
00117 
00122     explicit cArray(const char *name=NULL, int capacity=0, int delta=10);
00123 
00128     virtual ~cArray();
00129 
00137     cArray& operator=(const cArray& list);
00139 
00142 
00148     virtual cArray *dup() const  {return new cArray(*this);}
00149 
00154     virtual std::string info() const;
00155 
00160     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00161 
00167     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00168 
00174     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00176 
00179 
00185     int size() const {return last+1;}
00186 
00191     void clear();
00192 
00196     int getCapacity() const {return capacity;}
00197

00264

00270

00276 
00281     const cObject *operator[](int m) const  {return get(m);}
00282 
00287     const cObject *operator[](const char *objname) const  {return get(objname);}
00288 
00292     bool exist(int m) const  {return m>=0 && m<=last && vect[m]!=NULL;}
00293 
00298     bool exist(const char *objname) const  {return find(objname)!=-1;}

00305     cObject *remove(int m);

00344 
00350     bool getTakeOwnership() const   {return flags&FL_TKOWNERSHIP;}
